application.tooltipConfigsList: Model configurations enable AI model calls with specific parameters and templates. Use the configuration ID in your app; otherwise, it defaults to your predefined default configuration.

createApplication.applicationDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the project for team mates to easily understand
createApplication.createApiKeyPlaceholder: Provide a name for your new API key
createApplication.tooltipAPIKey: API Keys are used to authenticate your application with our servers. You can create multiple keys.

createConfigWizard.cohereParametersFrequencyPenaltyTooltip: Used to reduce repetitiveness of generated tokens. The higher the value, the stronger a penalty is applied to previously present tokens, proportional to how many times they have already appeared in the prompt or prior generation.
createConfigWizard.cohereParametersKTooltip: Ensures only the top k most likely tokens are considered for generation at each step.
createConfigWizard.cohereParametersMaxTokensTooltip: The maximum number of tokens the model will generate as part of the response. Note: Setting a low value may result in incomplete generations.
createConfigWizard.cohereParametersPTooltip: Ensures that only the most likely tokens, with total probability mass of p, are considered for generation at each step. If both k and p are enabled, p acts after k.
createConfigWizard.cohereParametersPresencePenaltyTooltip: Can be used to reduce repetitiveness of generated tokens. Similar to frequency_penalty, except that this penalty is applied equally to all tokens that have already appeared, regardless of their exact frequencies.
createConfigWizard.cohereParametersTemperatureTooltip: A non-negative float that tunes the degree of randomness in generation. Lower temperatures mean less random generations.
createConfigWizard.durationTooltip: Duration: Total time for complete output. Output streams automatically, with the first response occurring almost immediately.
createConfigWizard.errorCreatingConfig: An error occurred creating the config
createConfigWizard.errorRefreshingProject: An error occurred refreshing the project
createConfigWizard.noVariablesHeadline: The template has no variables - add as necessary or click on run test
createConfigWizard.openaiParametersFrequencyPenaltyTooltip: How much to penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far. Decreases the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
createConfigWizard.openaiParametersMaxTokensTooltip: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2048 tokens shared between prompt and response.
createConfigWizard.openaiParametersPresencePenaltyTooltip: How much to penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far. Increases the modelâ€™s likelihood to talk about new topics.
createConfigWizard.openaiParametersTemperatureTooltip: Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive. Higher temperature results in more random completions.
createConfigWizard.openaiParametersTopPTooltip: Controls diversity via nucleus sampling: 0.5 means half of all likelihood-weighted options are considered. As the top_p approaches 1, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.
createConfigWizard.promptMessagePlaceholder: The user favourite albums are: '{favouriteAlbums'}. The user disliked albums are: '{dislikedAlbums'}. Please suggest 5 new albums for the user.
createConfigWizard.runningTestError: There was an error running test, try again later or contact support
createConfigWizard.variablesTooltip: Required test inputs. Please add the values for the template variables. Variables are values defined inside '{'} in the template

createProject.applicationNameTooltip: An application represents a specific environment or app. You can create multiple applications within a project and each individual application can contain multiple different configuration for AI models.
createProject.createApiKeyPlaceholder: Provide a name for your new API key
createProject.invalidLengthErrorMessage: Name must be at least {numCharacters} characters long
createProject.projectInputTooltip: A project is the top-level entity that is used to manage users, permissions, billing and applications.
createProject.subTitle: A project is a top-level container for applications. In this step you create the project and its first application. In the next step, you'll add the firstAI model configuration to the application.
createProject.title: Create Project
createProject.tooltipAPIKey: API Keys are used to authenticate your application with our servers. You can create multiple keys.

entityNameInput.invalidLengthErrorMessage: Name must be at least {numCharacters} characters long

landingPage.benefitsPrivacyDescription: We don't save any of your users' data. We act as a pure pipeline between your users' devices and the AI models.
landingPage.benefitsPrivacyTitle: None of Your Users Data Saved.
landingPage.benefitsScalabilityDescription: BaseMind allows you to focus on your product, not your infrastructure. Ready for scale from day 1.
landingPage.benefitsSpeedDescription: Built with Golang and GRPC, BaseMind outperforms traditional backends with swift response times and scalable performance.
landingPage.ctaSectionSubtitle: Sign-up to our free beta, No credit card required.
landingPage.faqACostToStart: Starting with BaseMind is free and no credit card is required. We provide initial credits for AI model usage, which typically lasts for hundreds of calls. For production use, we offer customized packages that scale with your needs and fit every stage of your AI journey.
landingPage.faqADoYouSaveMyUserData: No, privacy and security is paramount for us. We therefore dont save any of your users' data on our system.
landingPage.faqAFasterThanBackend: Yes, our system, built with Golang and GRPC, is much faster than a typical custom backend. Plus, our systems can scale with your needs, ensuring efficiency as your app grows.
landingPage.faqAHelpWithSDK: Definitely! Just contact us and we'll guide you through the implementation process.
landingPage.faqAIsItSecure: Yes, it's secure. With our SDK, storing the key in your app is safe. Plus, even if someone accesses the key, they can only use the prompts you configured.
landingPage.faqANeedOpenAIKey: No, an OpenAI key isn't necessary. Just sign up, create a key for your app, and manage all AI model billing through BaseMind without exposing your OpenAI key.
landingPage.faqQCostToStart: How much does it cost, and do I need a credit card to start using BaseMind?
landingPage.faqQDoYouSaveMyUserData: Do you save my users' data?
landingPage.faqQFasterThanBackend: Are you faster than a custom backend?
landingPage.faqQHelpWithSDK: Can you help me implement the BaseMind SDK?
landingPage.faqQIsItSecure: Is it secure to store the BaseMind key in my mobile app?
landingPage.faqQNeedOpenAIKey: Do I need an OpenAI key to use BaseMind?
landingPage.featureDashboardDescription: Empower your team with a user-friendly dashboard. Make real-time changes without waiting for a new release.
landingPage.featureSectionTitle: The developer platform for AI apps
landingPage.featureServerlessDescription: Directly integrate AI models into your app. On Day 1 accelerate to Month 2
landingPage.featureStreamingDescription: Easily stream API responses from AI models
landingPage.featureVendorAgnosticDescription: Avoid vendor lock-in with a vendor-agnostic approach that future-proofs your AI
landingPage.featureVendorAgnosticTitle: One SDK to rule them all
landingPage.heroSubtitle: The BaseMind SDK accelerates AI feature development by enabling you to focus on creating value through your AI features, rather than spending time on building and maintaining infrastructure.
landingPage.heroTitle: Implement AI with a few lines of code
landingPage.pricingSubtitle: Tailored plans for every stage of your AI journey
